generated_body: The article titled "Big celebrity money moments of the last decade" is likely to explore significant financial events and trends involving well-known celebrities over the past ten years. Readers may expect insights into lucrative endorsements, high-profile business ventures, and notable sales of properties or collections. Additionally, the piece could highlight how these financial milestones reflect broader trends in celebrity culture and the entertainment industry. This exploration may include specific examples of celebrities who have successfully capitalized on their fame to generate substantial wealth, although exact details may vary.
